name: Army Attack Terrorist City 18
description:
Army Attack Terrorist City 18 is an action First Person Shooting war Game. You are the brave assassin in the army, aim to shoot the terrorists
Features:
• Combat against terrorist, tanks and choppers with powerful weapons!
• Eliminate Terrorist in critical strike shooting mission!
• Aim and shoot perfectly with sharp shooting skills!
• Thrilling and challenging FPS sniper experience!
• Amazing HD Graphics and real shooting sound effects!
